comments:
Sorry for creating a duplicate here.  However, I tried to reopened 103867, but
could not since there's no such option.

Even though it says 103867 has been fixed, it still happens everytime I tried
opening, modifying an xml file.  Can somebody provide instructions, if it is
available, how to fix this problem?

Error message:
An internal error occurred during: "Processing Dirty Regions".

Here is the session data provided by event detail:
eclipse.buildId=I20050627-1435
java.version=1.5.0_04
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.
BootLoader constants: OS=win32, ARCH=x86, WS=win32, NL=en_US
Command-line arguments:  -os win32 -ws win32 -arch x86

The error message may be the same, but the cause is different.  It looks like
you have mismatched plugin versions installed somehow.  How did you install WTP?
After I updated the wtp with 0.7.1, the problem is gone.  Thanks!

I guess it was caused by a mismatched version of xercis from apache.org.  Once I
updated the WTP to 0.7.1, it works fine.
